subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: Which of the following forts is also known as the 'City of Victory'?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित किला जीत का शहर के नाम से भी जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Amer Fort is also known as the 'City of Victory'.
explanation_hi: आमेर किला जीत का शहर के नाम से भी जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: What is the style of architecture used in the Mehrangarh Fort?
question_hi: मेहरानगढ़ किले में उपयोग की गई स्थापत्य शैली क्या है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is an example of Rajput Architecture.
explanation_hi: मेहरानगढ़ किला राजपूत स्थापत्य का उदाहरण है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: In which year was the Kumbhalgarh Fort built?
question_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला कब बनाया गया था?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला 16वीं शताब्दी में बनाया गया था।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: Which of the following forts is located near the village of Kumbhalgarh?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित किला कुंभलगढ़ गाँव के पास स्थित है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort is located near the village of Kumbhalgarh.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला कुंभलगढ़ गाँव के पास स्थित है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: What is the name of the fort built by Maharana Pratap?
question_hi: महाराणा प्रताप द्वारा बनाए गए किले का नाम क्या है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Maharana Pratap.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला महाराणा प्रताप द्वारा बनाया गया था।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: Which of the following forts is also known as the 'Desert Fort'?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित किला 'देसर्ट फोर्ट' के नाम से भी जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Meharangarh Fort is also known as the 'Desert Fort'.
explanation_hi: मेहरानगढ़ किला 'देसर्ट फोर्ट' के नाम से भी जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: In which state is the Kumbhalgarh Fort located?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort is located in the state of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला राजस्थान राज्य में स्थित है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: Which of the following forts is a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित किला यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल है?
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
explanation_hi: चित्तौड़गढ़ किला यूनेस्को विश्व धरोहर स्थल है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: What is the name of the fort built by Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राणा कुंभा द्वारा बनाए गए किले का नाम क्या है?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ किला राणा कुंभा द्वारा बनाया गया था।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Kile (Forts) aur unki Sthapatya Kala
question_en: Which of the following forts is located in the city of Jodhpur?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित किला जोधपुर शहर में स्थित है?
explanation_en: Meharangarh Fort is located in the city of Jodhpur.
